title: PicPay Prices US IPO at Top in First Brazilian Debut Since 2021
description: PicS NV, the fintech controlled by the billionaire Batista family, raised $434 million in a US initial public offering in the first significant debut for a Brazilian company in more than four years.
content: PicS NV, the fintech controlled by the billionaire Batista family, raised $434 million in a US initial public offering in the first significant debut for a Brazilian company in more than four years.
